item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. 0click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord and other platforms (205 points | 73 comments)
2. Should We Use AI and LLMs for Christian Apologetics? (49 points | 32 comments)
3. How many Alpine packages can you install at once? (2024) (16 points | 3 comments)

5. Metacognitive laziness: Effects of generative AI on learning motivation (143 points | 123 comments)
6. Kimi K1.5: Scaling Reinforcement Learning with LLMs (130 points | 18 comments)
7. Show HN: Amurex – An open source AI meeting copilot (35 points | 16 comments)
8. Prime Numbers So Memorable That People Hunt for Them (13 points | 1 comment)
9. DeepSeek-R1 (1509 points | 536 comments)
10. People are bad at reporting what they eat. That's a problem for dietary research (143 points | 216 comments)
11. Ask HN: Organize local communities without Facebook? (115 points | 93 comments)
12. Reverse engineering Call of Duty anti-cheat (412 points | 135 comments)
13. 'It's a nightmare': couriers mystified by the algorithms that control their jobs (76 points | 56 comments)
14. Mixxx: GPL DJ Software (574 points | 124 comments)
15. 417-megapixel Andromeda galaxy panorama took over a decade to make (235 points | 78 comments)

17. The Sonnenschein-Mantel-Debreu Results After Thirty Years (20 points | 6 comments)
18. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney, who does work for YC and startups. AMA (339 points | 355 comments)
19. Regency Sex Ed: How did women in 19th C. Europe learn about the birds and bees? (72 points | 27 comments)
20. Show HN: I made a mini golf in my lunch time (106 points | 51 comments)
21. Fixing a uname bug (Apache NuttX RTOS) (25 points | 5 comments)
22. ROCm Device Support Wishlist (183 points | 134 comments)
23. Startup Winter: Hacker News Lost Its Faith (400 points | 283 comments)
24. Garmin's –$40B Pivot (106 points | 134 comments)
25. Show HN: Printercow – Turn any thermal printer into an API endpoint (46 points | 58 comments)
26. SRCL: Open-source React project to build web apps with terminal aesthetics (162 points | 22 comments)
27. Using eSIMs with devices that only have a physical SIM slot via a 9eSIM SIM car (360 points | 206 comments)
28. Celestial Navigation for Drones (196 points | 115 comments)
29. Guitar chord karaoke with Vamp, Chordino, and FFmpeg (2022) (117 points | 34 comments)
